author: jstrachan
msg: Adding the ability to break out of loops based on Vinay's patch.
Throwing a BreakException will terminate a <forEach> or <while> loop, which the <break> tag now does (along with an optional test)

author: rwaldhoff
msg: add nominal support for {@link} tags within the tag reference
(better still to link these to the appropriate tag if available, but this at least renders correctly)

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched a number of old copyright years to 2002. Thanks for spotting this Michael

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched a number of old copyright years from 1999 to 2002. Thanks for spotting this Michael
